title: Hamilton Beach MultiBlend Blender 53517
transcripts: The Hamilton Beach MultiBlend Blender is not only perfect for smoothies, shakes, and icy drinks, but also sauces, dips, and much more. Add ingredients and blend directly in the 20 ounce travel jar when you're heading out the door or in the 48 ounce blending jar for larger recipes. The jars are shatterproof, BPA-free, and easy to clean. A stir spoon comes with the blender to help make sure all the ingredients are mixed well. With a 700 watt peak power motor, you'll have no trouble blending those tougher ingredients like ice, frozen fruits, or vegetables. Whether you're mixing up a smoothie to go or salsa for a group of friends, the Hamilton Beach MultiBlend Blender is just what you need. Now that's good thinking.
